task.title: Add a Cluster
task.shortdesc: To add a cluster perform the steps in this topic.

context.p: You might want to add a new cluster to your for a variety of reasons: adding new machines, using another hypervisor, or increasing capacity.
context.note: Each Eucalyptus cluster has its own cluster controller and storage controller. You can view detailed information about clusters by entering the following command: euca-describe-availability-zones verbose.
